title: Crypto Analyst Thomas Kralow Says He Is ‘Selling Everything to Buy Bitcoin’
description: In a recent video, highly respected trader, educator, and crypto analyst Thomas Kralow announced that he has decided to liquidate a significant portion of his assets to invest in Bitcoin. In this video, Kralow unpacks his decision, the rationale behind it, and his perspective on the cryptocurrency market. He stresses that this is not a […]

title: Harvard Provides Guidance on Integrating Generative AI in Education
description: In a significant step, Harvard University’s Faculty of Arts and Sciences (FAS) has issued comprehensive guidelines on incorporating generative artificial intelligence (AI) tools into higher education. This move highlights the rapid growth of AI and its potential impact on diverse academic fields. Just a year ago, the term “ChatGPT” was largely unfamiliar. However, the scenario ... Read more

title: AI-Powered Arbitration Assistant Successfully Resolves First Case
description: In a remarkable feat that has garnered attention worldwide, an innovative artificial intelligence arbitration assistant has achieved its inaugural success by effectively settling a dispute between two domestic private companies. Developed by the esteemed Guangzhou Arbitration Commission, this cutting-edge AI assistant has proven its worth by facilitating a swift resolution in a complex legal matter. ... Read more

title: Chainlink Price Poised For Rebound As Exchange Supply Drops
description: Chainlink (LINK) has hit a key level that has historically foreshadowed a price rebound. The token’s price is currently trading around $5.50, which is the same level it reached in December 2022 before starting a rally to $8.50. In addition, the exchange supply of LINK has been dropping. This means that there are fewer tokens […]

title: BREAKING: SEC Delays Bitcoin ETF Decision from BlackRock, Fidelity, VanEck, WisdomTree and Invesco Galaxy to this New Date. BTC Price Drops 5%
description: The SEC has moved the deadlines for approving or denying Bitcoin ETF applications from major investment firms to mid-October 2023. Bitcoin’s market value experienced a 5% decline, tumbling down to $26,100 following the SEC’s announcement. In an electrifying development, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has once again deferred its decision on multiple pending [...]
